title: Extreme Cool Nicotine Pouches by Ace
description: TRY ACE EXTREME NICOTINE POUCHES Extreme Cool Nicotine Pouches by Ace features an expertly balanced mix of peppermint and menthol, providing a truly refreshing experience. Ace SuperWhite Extreme Cool is a strong and balanced nicotine pouch with a blend of mint blended with a coolness that offers an intense flavour experience. View all Ace Nicotine Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches KEY FEATURES: Strong menthol and Peppermint flavoured nicotine pouches Designed for a strong nicotine kick Great substitute for cigarettes Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 16MG Per Gram | 9.6MG Per Pouch MORE ABOUT STRONG MENTHOL FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The characteristic flavour of fresh peppermint melds perfectly with the ice-cold menthol providing you with an invigorating rush. If you're looking for an intense menthol experience, then these nicotine pouches are perfect for you. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES Ace's tobacco-free, slim nicotine pouches are perfect for discreet usage. Each pouch fits securely under your lip, offering you a discreet and effective nicotine experience. Ace's pouches are for experienced users and are available in a range of flavours, so make sure you check out the rest of the range. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Ace Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Medium Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch): 9.0 MG Flavour Name: Extreme Mint Flavour: Strong menthol and peppermint Pouches per can: 24 Shipping from: London, UK
